name: Near Death (itch)
description:
Near Death is a Fast paced, Top down shooter! Be resurrected, survive and fight! Play and enjoy colourful explosions!

Linux or mac version is recommended, Window's versions have text issues/glitch's that could not be fixed due to time restrictions.

Special Features

  • Tight Controls
  • Explosions!
  • Squares  ^-^
  • Fast paced/ hectic
  • Screen-Shake!!!CONTROLS:

Move to move!

Shoot to shoot!

-Made for the VimJam(8-bits-to-infinity).
